pkgmetadata.longdescription: üêô oktopus==========|ci-badge| |cov-badge| |zenodo-badge|.. |ci-badge| image:: https://travis-ci.org/KeplerGO/oktopus.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/KeplerGO/oktopus.. |cov-badge| image:: https://codecov.io/gh/mirca/oktopus/branch/master/graph/badge.svg :target: https://codecov.io/gh/mirca/oktopus/branch/master/.. |zenodo-badge| image:: https://zenodo.org/badge/84591713.svg :target: https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/84591713A soft-bodied, eight-armed package for beautiful inference.To install ``oktopus``, run:: pip install oktopusor:: git clone https://github.com/KeplerGO/oktopus.git cd oktopus pip install -e .And you're all set!
